title: Villanova Turns to Defense in Run to Final Four - WSJ

Sports College Basketball Villanova Turns to Defense in Run to Final Four The Wildcats sent a message to their rivals: They can win even when they struggle to score By Jared Diamond Jared Diamond The Wall Street Journal Biography Jared Diamond @jareddiamond Google+ March 26, 2018 BOSTON—All season long, as Villanova steamrolled the competition with its supercharged offensive attack and established itself as a serious championship contender, coach Jay Wright tried to dispel his players’ increasingly lofty aspirations. The Wildcats, Wright said Sunday after they advanced to the Final Four, “were not a good defensive team for most of the year”—certainly not good enough to achieve what they wanted to achieve.
